Package bss.Keywords

Class Tokenizer

java.lang.Object
bss.Keywords.Tokenizer
public class Tokenizer extends Object
Provides methods for tokenizing and processing keywords using Stanford CoreNLP. This class handles the annotation, extraction, and transformation of tokens for keyword analysis and matching.

  • Method Details

    • createAnnotatedTokens

      public static ArrayList<edu.stanford.nlp.ling.CoreLabel> createAnnotatedTokens(String keyword)
      Creates annotated tokens for the given keyword using Stanford CoreNLP.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to annotate.
      Returns:
      A list of CoreLabel tokens annotated by Stanford CoreNLP.

    • extractTokensWithLemmas

      public static ArrayList<String> extractTokensWithLemmas(ArrayList<edu.stanford.nlp.ling.CoreLabel> annotatedTokens)
      Extracts tokens with their lemmas from a list of annotated tokens.
      Parameters:
      annotatedTokens - A list of CoreLabel tokens.
      Returns:
      A list of token strings with their lemmas.

    • replaceLemmas

      public static String replaceLemmas(String str)
      Replaces the words in the given string with their lemmas.
      Parameters:
      str - The input string to be replaced with lemmas.
      Returns:
      The string with words replaced by their lemmas.

    • identifyPossibleMatches

      public static HashMap<Categories,HashMap<ArrayList<String>,String>> identifyPossibleMatches(List<String> tokens)
      Identifies possible matches for tokens based on predefined categories and entries.
      Parameters:
      tokens - A list of token strings to match.
      Returns:
      A map of possible matches categorized by category and token groupings.

    • removeExtraneousTokens

      public static List<String> removeExtraneousTokens(ArrayList<edu.stanford.nlp.ling.CoreLabel> annotatedTokens, List<String> tokens)
      Removes extraneous tokens from a list based on their part of speech and other criteria.
      Parameters:
      annotatedTokens - A list of annotated tokens.
      tokens - A list of token strings to filter.
      Returns:
      The filtered list of tokens.

    • retokenizeAllKeywords

      public static void retokenizeAllKeywords()
      Retokenizes all keywords and writes the updated keywords to a JSON file.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error accessing or writing data.
